item.title: [HBASE-14204] HBase Client API not working with pig 0.14 and 0.15

item.summary: HBase Client API not working with pig 0.14 and 0.15

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: This looks like a Pig problem or a problem with the classpath. Remember that HBase-0.98 versions and 1.0 versions are NOT binary compatible (means that you cannot swap 0.98 jars with 1.0 jars). Please ask the question in pig-user and hbase-user mailing lists.
